## ChampionSpell class

The representation of a champion's spell (ability).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ChampionSpell 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, champ, data, damage)](./shieldbow.championspell._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ChampionSpell</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cooldown](./shieldbow.championspell.cooldown.md) |  | string | The cooldown of this ability (in seconds).<!-- -->If the cooldown scales with rank of the ability, will be of the format - <code>r1/r2/r3...</code>Where <code>r1</code> is the cooldown at rank 1, <code>r2</code> is the cooldown at rank 2, and so on. |
|  [cooldownByLevel](./shieldbow.championspell.cooldownbylevel.md) |  | number\[\] | Numerical representation of the spell's cooldown. The array contains the cooldown sorted by ranks.<!-- -->To get the cooldown at rank 3, you can use <code>spell.cooldownByLevel[2]</code>. |
|  [cost](./shieldbow.championspell.cost.md) |  | string | The cost of using this spell (contains the resource used/generated). |
|  [costByLevel](./shieldbow.championspell.costbylevel.md) |  | number\[\] | The numerical representation of the spell's costs. The array contains the cost sorted by ranks.<!-- -->To get the cost at rank 3, you can use <code>spell.costByLevel[2]</code>. |
|  [costType](./shieldbow.championspell.costtype.md) |  | string | The resource needed to use the ability. |
|  [description](./shieldbow.championspell.description.md) |  | string | A short textual description of the ability. |
|  [icon](./shieldbow.championspell.icon.md) |  | string | The URL to the icon of this ability. |
|  [id](./shieldbow.championspell.id.md) |  | string | The ID of the spell. |
|  [maxAmmo](./shieldbow.championspell.maxammo.md) |  | number | The number of times this ability can be used. -1 indicates it has no ammo system. |
|  [maxRank](./shieldbow.championspell.maxrank.md) |  | number | The max number of skill points (gained by leveling up the champion) that can be put into this spell. |
|  [name](./shieldbow.championspell.name.md) |  | string | The displayed name of the ability. |
|  [rawTooltip](./shieldbow.championspell.rawtooltip.md) |  | string | The raw tooltip of the champion spell. This is a more detailed description and contains the numbers of any effects and damage the spell applies.<!-- -->The raw tooltip also contains some HTML-like tags such as <code>&lt;scaleAP&gt;</code> to help style it better if you are making a website that needs to use this. |
|  [tooltip](./shieldbow.championspell.tooltip.md) |  | string | The tooltip of the champion spell. This is a more detailed description and contains the numbers of any effects and damage the spell applies.<!-- -->The tooltip is cleaned off of any HTML-like tags to display text in a nicer format. |
